summary: Autohire - a platform for hiring candidates and managing freelancing opportunities

existing_features.title: Create a job posting system where employers can create, edit, and delete job listings with fields including job title, description, required skills, employment type (full-time, part-time, contract, freelance), location, salary range, and application deadline
Implement a candidate browsing interface where employers can search and filter candidates by skills, experience level, availability, and employment preferences

Create a candidate profile system where job seekers and freelancers can create profiles including name, professional summary, skills, work experience, portfolio links, hourly rate (for freelancers), and availability status

Build an application management system where candidates can apply to job postings, employers can review applications, and both parties can track application status (pending, reviewed, shortlisted, rejected, accepted)
Implement a freelancing marketplace view that specifically highlights freelance opportunities and contract-based work, separate from traditional employment listings
Create a dashboard for employers showing their active job postings, received applications count, and quick access to candidate search
Create a dashboard for candidates showing recommended jobs based on their skills, application history, and saved job postings

Design a professional, modern visual theme for Autohire with a cohesive color palette emphasizing trust and professionalism, clean typography optimized for readability of job listings and profiles, and a layout that balances employer and candidate user flows effectively
Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link and text from the Footer component
